medical_history.chief_complaint: Concern for potential X-linked hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia (XLHED) in twins.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The twins were diagnosed at gestational week 22. The mother was concerned due to her older son having XLHED, characterized by complete absence of sweat pores and inability to sweat. Genetic testing confirmed hemizygosity for the EDA mutation in the twins.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mother is a heterozygous carrier for the EDA mutation; the older son has XLHED.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes the older brother who has XLHED.
